title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 92.4 - Basis of valuation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 92.4 - Basis of valuation

State Regulations

The basis of valuation of all such policies and contracts shall be that specified in the Insurance Law for the respective types of insurers above referred to. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
92.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
